name: pizzahead
description: A carnivore's delight with pepperoni, sausage, and bacon!

name: Veggie Vortex
description: A tornado of fresh veggies like spinach, mushrooms, and red peppers!

name: The Margherita
description: Simple and classic, with fresh basil, tomatoes, and mozzarella!

name: Pesto Perfecto
description: Basil pesto sauce with roasted red peppers and feta cheese!

name: The Sausage Party
description: Sausage, onions, and green peppers, all invited to the party!

name: The Hawaiian
description: A tropical paradise on a pizza with ham and pineapple!

name: The Greek
description: Kalamata olives, feta cheese, and red onions, oh my!

name: The BBQ Chicken
description: Grilled chicken, red onions, and a tangy BBQ sauce!

name: The pizzaball Madness
description: pizzaballs, onions, and green peppers, all baked to perfection!

name: The Veggie Medley
description: A garden's worth of veggies, including zucchini, broccoli, and mushrooms!

name: The Buffalo Chicken
description: Spicy buffalo chicken, blue cheese crumbles, and a drizzle of ranch!

name: The Baconator
description: Bacon, bacon, and more bacon, with a side of bacon!

name: The Caprese
description: Fresh tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella, with a balsamic glaze!

name: The pizza Lover's Delight
description: A pizzay masterpiece with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham!

name: The Vegan Veggie
description: A vegan delight with vegan cheese, red onions, and mushrooms!

name: The Spicy Italian
description: Spicy Italian sausage, banana peppers, and red onions, for a kick of flavor!

name: The Cheesy Breaded
description: A cheesy breadstick crust, loaded with sauce, cheese, and your choice of toppings!
